techmeme.title: Google Search Labs is ending its Notes experiment, which debuted in December 2023 as a way to let users leave "helpful tips about an article" directly on Search (Abner Li/9to5Google)
Elon Musk says that X's headquarters will move to Austin, after he protested a new California law that bans schools' transgender notification policies (Laura Waxmann/San Francisco Chronicle)
Andrej Karpathy, an OpenAI co-founder and former head of Tesla's autopilot unit, unveils Eureka Labs, a "new kind of school" aiming to support teachers with AI (Akash Sriram/Reuters)
A look at draft AI policies from Trump allies at the America First Policy Institute and the Heritage Foundation that target "burdensome" AI regulations (Cat Zakrzewski/Washington Post)
US Senate preliminary report: Amazon Prime Day is a "major" cause of worker injuries, with Prime Day 2019 data showing "just under" 45 injuries per 100 workers (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
